You need a boot loader or your OS won't start.  (If you could get rid of it why would you bother fixing it?)

You need a boot loader.  The boot loader sits (partly) in the MBR.  Grub is a boot loader, Lilo is a boot loader, the Windows boot loader is a boot loader.  If you can start an OS you have a boot loader.
